tag.desc: HTML tag to render, unless no icon is supplied or it's an svg icon

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Font color (from the Quasar Palette) of buttons and text in the toolbar
color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

left.description: Useful if icon is on the left side of something: applies a standard margin on the right side of Icon
left.description_zh: 如果图标位于某物的左侧，则很有用：在图标的右侧应用标准边距

right.description: Useful if icon is on the right side of something: applies a standard margin on the left side of Icon
right.description_zh: 如果图标位于某物的右侧，则很有用：在图标的左侧应用标准边距
